ygData.subject: Re: Fashion First was Re: Hero bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to make sure you are aware.  Hero bracers are green plate.  Not sure how well that would go with your black. Laluni Songhammer of E Ci
ygData.messageBody:
Just to make sure you are aware. Hero bracers are green plate. Not sure how well that would go with your
black.

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci

Ronnie Roads wrote:

> From: Ronnie Roads <rkroads@...>
>
> Hmm I guess it's the price you pay for such dainty, delicate frames ;P.
>
> I have gone back to black armor to wear with the two pieces of imbrued I have
> (greaves and one bracer). I now have a black enamelled breastplate - all fixed so
> that bards can wear it; there was a question for awhile. No stats but the AC 25 is
> very nice (I paid 1000 plat for it, by the way). For those of you tired of blue it
> is a nice alternative. I am also going to do the Watchman Boots quest in North
> Karana (I hear they look like black plate and they are AC5 +5 STA - much better than
> blackened iron boots) and the Hero Bracer quest (for the strength) to finish off the
> outfit.
>
> Fashion first brothers and sisters =).
>
> //Maravana Vireo
> //50 Bard of the Jus Divinum
> //Mithaniel Marr
>
> >
> > Ack why cant wood elfs wear it then 8(
> >
> > Wintir
> >
> > "Steven S. Klug" wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>
> > >
> > > Actually, half elves can wear it just fine. I'm half-elf, and proudly wear
> > mine.
> > >
> > > Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci

> > > > Wintir, bard of the 17'th grammy
